manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: o.b. Applicator Free Digital Tampons, Regular – 40 Count

o.b. Applicator Free Digital Tampons, Regular – 40 Count For light flow days (between 6 and 9g). The soft, classic feel of o.b. Original Regular tampons. Sometimes it’s good to stay with what you love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only brand I use. For some reason it’s been hard to find but having it on my subscribe monthly makes it so much more convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impossible To Find!
reviews.reviewText: Great price and recurring shipping available!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Quantity & Price!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical when they arrived because they were very small. But they expanded and absorbed a normal amount. And because they were small, I was able to insert them into a comfortable position that did not bother me as larger applicator tampons have. And I did not have the cramps caused by chemical filled tampons. I am very happy with my purchase and I will buy these again. Great quality, quantity and price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Los mejores tampones
reviews.reviewText: Tengo años usando la marca ob, es la mejor y el empaque de 40 es muy práctico y rendidor. Nunca me he quedado sin ellos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Legit product, hard to find in stores
reviews.reviewText: I never thought I'd be ordering menstration products from Amazon, but here I am... I just can't get these at my local stores anymore.... I was hesitant at first, worried I'd get some severely inferior product that might cause some rare, news-making infection. I read a few reviews though, and these seemed to be legit so I placed my order. Can confirm, at least when shipped thru Amazon, that these are not knock-offs, they are legit. These are my favorite brand/style because they are so easy-to-use, eco-friendly/create less waste, are discrete and portable, comfortable and they work. I realize I could try change to a different brand or product that is available to me locally, but there's just certain things in life that I'm brand loyal to - this is one of them. I'm grateful to get these thru Amazon, and I'd be so dissapointed if the manufacturer discontinues making these. One could easily put these on a routine shipment to make life easier - I (fortunately) don't go thru them fast enough so don't have to worry about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as good as the yellow wrappers
reviews.reviewText: So the regulars with the red wrapper just aren’t the quality of the yellow wrappers. I’m not as fond of them. Somehow I don’t trust them as much! Overall easy to transport, keep discreet, and use. They’re less painful than using an applicator and less wasteful. They’re also quieter in a public bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've used these for years. They're the most absorbent and best fitting. I could not find them in any stores after moving so now I order online. I've tried other brands and hate them. No applicator waste, fits in a tiny purse or pocket, I find they are easier to put in then a traditional applicator type too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Yes yes yes! Worth the replacement of current tampon (Obi regulars for TAMPAX regulars)
reviews.reviewText: First time buyer and wasn't sure what to expect but overall good experience!Opened the box and was shocked how compact it was... wasn't sure if a single Obi tampon would absorb what I want it to. After fluffing it out, it was as big as Tampax regular tampons.HOW TO REMOVE WRAPPING:Took me a few times to figure out how to efficiently remove the wrapping without touching the clean tampon with my fingers/ hands too much as it will be going into my body...** Check out the photos for a step to step guide!!**PERSONALI am usually a light to medium flow gal, occasional heavy (usually the first day). Irregular flow as sometimes it can be light then medium then light again in the same cycle. Was using Tampax as it was more affordable than other brands I've tried.Decided to try a budget friendly Obi as necessity costs add up.In the recent period cycle, I used a Tampax super for the night as it is usually a larger flow. Then I started using Obi the day after. I change it out after 3.5 to 4 hours and it kept everything together. No leakage. I'm pleasantly pleased and want to continue using Obi on light to medium days.Uncertain how far can one Obi regular really go but it is currently matching the Tampax regulars.CONs1. Hard to remove the plastic wrapping at first but after some practice, I am OK.2. The plastic wrapping. It feels worst from my initial Tampax where they use paper wrappings and paper inserts. I guess the plastic keeps it compact..?3. I am OK with inserting Obi tampons with my fingers. It may be an issue to some people.Although there are cons, it is a pretty good product to use and since I'm replacing Tampax regulars with Obi regulars, I consider this a win.
Love that it’s wrapped in plastic, but no plastic applicator….

I am boycotting tampax (IYKYK). I needed a new brand but was also having trouble finding a tampon that I liked at all after having a baby, things just felt different down there. I actually didn’t like the idea of not having an applicator but it gives a lot more control for placement which equals more comfort and doesn’t slide down as it gets saturated.Highly recommend if your boycotting tampax, or are looking for a more comfortable tampon.

I wanted to switch to an organic brand and tried others before this that I really liked but these were a cheaper option. Not a fan of the no applicator as it can make it tricky and also hurts to insert. I won’t buy these again after the box is empty and i’m gonna switch back to the other organic brand I was using

Unbeknownst to many in the lay public, this is a great portable option for those who gets frequent nose bleeds. And during an era of wearing masks can be easily hidden if the nosebleed last long and duration. Nice, portable, small size.
